name: CataloGO
author: Julio Mateos

sections.description: This is a plugin for create and publish catalogs; it’s possible select a type of catalog for create a new catalog. It’s possible add registers to this catalogs and publish the catalogs into a post.
sections.installation:
1. Upload catalog to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload catalog to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

It’s possible create several catalogs?

Yes, you can create several catalogs with different name.

It’s possible create catalog with different structure?

Yes, it’s possible create catalogs from a type that define the structura, but for the initial versions only one type is available.
